## [Hongsup Shin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hongsupshin/)
Hongsup is the organizer of the Austin ML Journal Club. He organizes the club meetings, and maintains the blog and the journal club GitHub repository. 

He currently works as a Principal ML Research Engineer at Arm. Until recently, he also volunteered at Texas Justice Initiative, a criminal justice non-profit in Austin. His background is computational neuroscience and behavioral ecology.
